channel.title: Vps
channel.description: i ran a server a few months ago, but i had to stop because it was taking its toll on my computer...now i want to run it again, but i want it up 24/7...i have no idea how to get a vps...if someone could tell me what website i should use, and what to do to make my server 24/7, it would really help...

item.dc:creator: @flexo6 flexo6
item.description:

thanks, and i know they cost money lol but im still probably gonna have to post more questions…your help only post-poned my stupid posts

@_Rich wrote:

just to add, OP, the server will still crash if it is poorly programmed (which 95% of the servers posted here are).

also, not a server help related question, moving…

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

  1. Just to inform you, they do COST you
  2. You buy the VPS, using your info, they give user + pass, and you run your source from it.
  3. Yes, VPS’s make your server 24/7, excluding any VPS company troubles
